content: That was the first time, in the history of chess, that a machine (Deep Blue) defeated a Grand Master (Garry Kasparov).
translations: ita:Quella fu la prima volta, nella storia degli scacchi, che una macchina (Deep Blue) sconfisse un Gran Maestro (Garry Kasp
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
